archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0850
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Disclosure Manager/Analyst, I want to be able to link any targets already searched by our Fraud investigators to their case identifier number to eliminate task duplication where records have already been extracted by the Fraud team by way of any identifier given by NZ Law Enforcement Agencies under statutory orders served, to ensure that we are able to provide evidential records which assist NZ Law Enforcement Agencies in either proving the criminal offending or innocence of customers who are using our services or staff who may be administering the services.

properties.value: It's about searching cases of fraud type

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
